lyrics:
Yeah
I was told when I was young
Some day I would meet someone
Love would come to anyone
Waiting patiently
I've wait for mister Right to come
Spending time with mister Wrong
All this time I thought that love
Was never meant for me
Then suddenly I saw you
I knew you were the one
And if I could make you see me now
I know the time will come
Wherever you go
Whatever you do
Wherever you run to - I will follow you
Wherever you are
Whatever you say - I will be there anyway
I've gotta let you know I'm here
Face my love and if you dare
Keep the other girls away
That's how much I care
You might not understand it yet
My love for you is the best you'll get
Give me just one chance to prove
That I am made for you
Don't know what makes you special
I know that you're the one
And you might find me persistant, babe
But I know my time will come
Wherever you go
Whatever you do
Wherever you run to - I will follow you
Wherever you are
Whatever you say - I will be there anyway
Anyway
I don't know what makes you special
I know that you're the one
And you might find me persistant, babe
But I know my time will come
Wherever you go
Whatever you do
Wherever you run to - I will follow you (I will follow you)
Wherever you are
Whatever you say - I will be there anyway
Wherever you go (Go)
Whatever you do (Do)
Wherever you run to - I will follow you (I will follow)
Wherever you are (Yeah)
Whatever you say (Say) - I will be there anyway
Wherever you are
Whatever you say - I will be there anyway
